basic_info.description: I am a creative designer and software developer, passionate about learning new technologies and expanding my skill set. I am currently pursuing a computer software engineering program at Code Fellows, where I am gaining hands-on experience in web development, data structures, algorithms, and software design principles. I aspire to combine my creative and technical abilities to create innovative and user-friendly products that solve real-world problems and enhance user experiences.

projects.title: SotA: Secret of the Ancients
projects.description: A 2D dungeon crawler/arcade game similar to Tower of Drauga in which the user must navigate a maze to find a key which will open a door to the next floor. This project utilized a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to implement many features to enhance user game play experience. Some of these features included JS functions to autogenerate barriers, functions to control collisions with objects, enemies, and doors, and a function that tracked player score across levels.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
